contents: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading  2tbsp Nannari Syrup per serving 1 Handful basil leaves Lime slices (garnish) Juice of 1-2 limes Crushed ice Rose syrup (optional)   Directions  Add 8 tbsp syrup and 6 cups water to jug Add juice of 2 limes and stir Add crushed ice and basil leaves, shake. Optional: add a tsp of rose syrup at bottom of glass Pour shaken drinks, garnish with fresh lime   Footnotes   Nannari Sherbet is a popular drink in India, particularly over the hot summers. ↩︎
title: Iced Nannari Sherbet

contents: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading  1 large potato 1 medium Cauliflower 1 2 tbsp Chickpea Flour (Besan) 3-5 Roti / Tortilla (Wrap) 1 bunch Cilantro (small) 1 tsp cumin seeds 1 tbsp oil 1 small green chilli 1 small piece of ginger  Directions  Chop 1 large potato into chunks  Microwave in covered bowl for 3 minutes on high   Wash 1 head of cauliflower, chop into florets. Peel 1 small piece of ginger, mince. Cut 1 green chilli into pieces (de-seed for less heat)1 Saute 1 cumin, ginger, chili in 1 tsp oil, in pan. Add potatoes, cover and cook 5 mins. Add cauliflower, salt to taste. Cover and cook 5 mins. Sprinkle 2 tbsp besan with 1 tsp water. Cook 5 mins. Stir, add chopped coriander, test if cooked. Add salt to taste, wrap in roti and grill for 2 mins.  Footnotes   Chilli is optional. ↩︎
title: Aloo Besan Wrap
